root: ^Me and %FullName:NPC:1% are on vacation in a new place and are exploring.
^What town should we go to next?

res1: ^We got o this town and we happen to go on the day when everything is closed.
^Apparently, everything in Newcastle is closed on a Monday. Of course, we had no idea. But we both get mad and end up getting into a big argument with one another and the whole day is just ruined.
res2: ^We had to this town and it turns out there is a big fair and carnival that we attend and it's so much fun.

^We had to pay money to get into this fair but it was totally worth it. I played one of those games where I had to keep swinging a sledgehammer and hitting a weight in order to try to ring the bell at the top and after many swings I finally did it and won a prize for %FullName:NPC:1% and we just have the best time.
global decl: ^What town should we go to next?
